CVE.summary: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 7u51 and 8, and Java SE Embedded 7u51, allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Security.

IAVM.title: Multiple Vulnerabilities in Oracle Java SE

vFeed.Author: NJ OUCHN
